MQA.Icon

Image object for the POI

Parameters

imageURL(string) The URL of the icon graphic.
width(int) The width of the image in pixels.
height(int) The height of the image in pixels.

MQA.Poi

Constructs a MQPoi object.  Describes a point of interest (POI) which is best represented as a simple point on the map.  Examples are schools, restaurants, airports, hotels, landmarks, and any other type of location that can be described as a point on a map.

Parameters

latLng(MQA.LatLng) Latitude/Longitude object specifying the location of the point on the map.
iconOptional (MQA.Icon) The icon to use for the POI.  If this parameters is not provided, the default icon will be used.

Extends

MQA.Base

Properties

These properties can be manipulated via the MQA.Base.setValue, MQA.Base.setValues, and MQA.Base.getValue functions.

key(string) The user-defined key.
icon(MQA.Icon) The image to use.
iconOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the image from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
shadow(MQA.Icon) The shadow image to use.
shadowOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the shadow image from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
infoWindowOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the infoWindow from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
altIcon(MQA.Icon) The alternate image to use.
altIconOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the image from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
altShadow(MQA.Icon) The alternate shadow image to use.
altShadowOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the shadow image from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
altInfoWindowOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the infoWindow from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
declutterIcon(MQA.Icon) The declutter image to use.
declutterIconOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the image from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
declutterShadow(MQA.Icon) The declutter shadow image to use.
declutterShadowOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the shadow image from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
declutterInfoWindowOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the infoWindow from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
HTMLContent(string) HTML content to use for an HTML-based POI.
HTMLOffset(MQA.Point) The offset of the POI HTML from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
HTMLInfoWindowOffset(MQA.Point) the offset of the infoWindow from the POI’s Lat/Lng.
altStateFlag(boolean) Specifies whether the POI is in an alt-state or not.
visible(boolean) Specifies whether the POI is visible.
infoContentHTML(string) The InfoWindow content.
infoTitleHTML(string) The InfoWindow title.
maxInfoWindowWidth(int) The maximum InfoWindow width.
titleBackgroundColor(string) The hex background color of the InfoWindow’s title bar.
infoWindowTitleText(string) The text of the InfoWindow’s title bar.
rolloverEnabled(boolean) Specifies whether a mouseover event will pop up the rollover window.
labelText(string) The text of the label.
labelClass(string) The CSS class of the label.
labelVisible(boolean) Specifies whether the label is visible.
draggable(boolean) Specifies whether the POI is draggable.
snapback(boolean) Specifies whether the POI will snap back to its original position after being dragged.
keepRolloverOnDrag(boolean) Specifies whether the rollover window should stay visible during dragging.
leaderLineColor(string) The color of the leader line.  See MQA.Declutter
leaderLineDotImage(MQA.Icon) The image to use for the leader line dot image.  See MQA.Declutter
minZoomLevel(int) The minimum zoom level that the POI should be visible.
maxZoomLevel(int) The maximum zoom level that the POI should be visible.
